website_summaries.verdict: Best suited for oily skin, as it is designed to create a shine-free look.
pros: Designed to absorb oil and create a shine-free finish all day
Helps to hide imperfections like fine lines, age spots, and large pores
cons: This powder is thin and customers complained that it gets everywhere when you apply it

customer_reviews.title: Estee Lauder falls below my expectations.
customer_reviews.text: I have purchase Estee Lauder loose powder for many years. I was able to buy the translucent which was not designated as any color. For me, this was an excellent product. More recently, they only offered loose Powder in Light or darker shades. I bought the light (and it is not really light for very fair skin) so it looks darker on my skin and not very attractive. This product is expensive and so not to waste it by not using it at all, I bought another product which is light and mix that with the Estee Lauder to lighten it for my use. I would not buy the Estee Lauder again unless they offer the translucent powder again.
customer_reviews.author: blykin

customer_reviews.title: Provides smooth, flawless skin
customer_reviews.text: I use this over my foundation to give my skin a smooth appearance with no shine. The translucent powder I use is truly colorless so it won’t look to light or too dark with your foundation. And sometimes I just use it over an ultralight, moisturizing tinted sunscreen with a bit of concealer around my eyes and my skin still looks good. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Machell G

customer_reviews.title: I do not care for the top piece of plastic ...
customer_reviews.text: I do not care for the top piece of plastic which keeps the loose powder from spilling out. Need to bang it to get it out on the powder puff. GrammaBoo
customer_reviews.author: GrammaBoo

customer_reviews.title: Silky powder, but no puff
customer_reviews.text: I have never been one to spend a lot of money on makeup, but after trying this powder that one of my friends had, I had to get some. It’s silky and long- lasting. Clearly superior to the drug store brand I’ve always used that cost ten bucks. But for $43, you’d really think they could throw in a powder puff, brush, or some method of application.

product_meta.title: Estee Lauder Perfecting Loose Powder Translucent
product_meta.description: Color:TranslucentIncredibly light and pleasantly smooth. Estée Lauder's Perfecting Loose Powder provides a sleek, natural looking and matte finish that provides an utterly flawless perfection. The oil-free powder keeps shine under control whilst masking imperfections and pores. To use: Tap a powder brush into the powder, then gently blow or tap off any excess. Pat or sweep lightly over face.
feature_bullets: Controls shine, hides flaws. Sheer finish.
Lighter than air. Softer than silk. Incredibly fine.
This micro-sheer, oil-free powder controls shine and helps hide imperfections and pores.
Fuses makeup into smooth, flawless perfection.
